pr_title: Unmute kerberos tests for jdk 15 and mute for jdk 8u262

timeline.message:
Unmute kerberos tests for jdk 15 (#60260)

The JDK bug (https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8246193) is fixed since b26. 
The tests can be unmuted since we are already using b33.

Relates: #56507
Mute kerberos tests for jdk 8u262 due to jdk bug

timeline.body:
I'd prefer this comment was more descriptive so that readers don't have to follow the URL.
```suggestion
    //  JDK 8u262 shipped with a NPE in Kerberos code, see https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/56507
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
I'd prefer this comment was more descriptive so that readers don't have to follow the URL.

Suggested change
// Skip tests for jdk 8u262 https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/56507
// JDK 8u262 shipped with a NPE in Kerberos code, see https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/56507
timeline.author: tvernum

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
assumeFalse("AwaitsFix on JDK 8u262", "1.8.0_262".equals(System.getProperty("java.version")));
assumeFalse("Cannot run on JDK 8u262", "1.8.0_262".equals(System.getProperty("java.version")));
timeline.author: tvernum

timeline.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Tim Vernum <tim@adjective.org>
